reviewText: 707-485-8807. I am looking for a copy of this tape.

This is an in-depth video that documents the events leading up the atomic bombings that ended WWII.  The facts are presented in a straightforward fashion without the revisionist history so popular today.  Prof. Giles is well known for his work in the Pacific and is widely acknowledged as an authority on Tinian and the B-29 offensive.  As with many VHS titles, the dubbing leaves something to be desired and we can only hope for a future DVD edition.
